About the Company: Sreeleathers Limited is an India-based company engaged in the business of dealing in all kinds of footwear and leather accessories. The Company is also a retailer and wholesaler of footwear and leather articles. As of January 21, 2013, the Company had 30 retail outlets, including outlets owned by franchise, spread over nine states, including West Bengal, Bihar, and Jharkhand. The Company was engaged in financing activities dealing in consumer goods. The Companys product range includes formal shoes for men, chappal, sandals and kanvaz for ladies and kids. The Companys other products include belts, wallets, and handbags.
